alert.note: Alert for Lowlands of the Bootheel; Uplands of the Bootheel (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 01 at 6:01AM MST until January 01 at 11:00PM MST by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...New Mexico Bootheel in southern Hidalgo County. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Winds will damage tents and outdoor objects is left unsecured. Temporary power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: A High Wind Warning means a hazardous high wind event is expected or occurring. Sustained wind speeds of at least 40 mph or gusts of 58 mph or more can lead to property damage.

area.areaDesc: Lowlands of the Bootheel; Uplands of the Bootheel
